text: Return to first principles; the simplest faithful step opens the next door.
Resist the rush to certainty; let patience ripen discernment.
Honor the sabbath of your nervous system; rest is part of holy work.
When in doubt, choose what keeps your heart soft and your spine strong.
Generosity breaks stalemates. Offer what you wish you had received.
Name the fear, bless it, and take the next faithful inch forward.
